Detailed Description

Stack start functions init structure

Field Documentation

uint8_t stack_init_t::channel
 

Routers and coordinattors use this only.

uint8_t stack_init_t::mac_address[8]
 

Software MAC defined by user.

uint8_t stack_init_t::pan_id[2]
 

Routers and coordinattors use this only.

uint8_t stack_init_t::pending_ttl_time
 

Coordinator use this parameter to detect max pending time (pending_ttl_time * 15 seconds period).

uint8_t stack_init_t::short_address[2]
 

Routers and coordinattors use this only.

log_dev_type_t stack_init_t::type
 

AD_HOC_DEVICE / BEACON_ENABLE_CLIENT / BEACON_ENABLE_COORDINATOR / BEACON_ENABLE_ROUTER.

uint8_t stack_init_t::use_sw_mac
 

1=use software MAC address, 0= use hardware MAC address.
